articles.title: Russia to launch its first mission to the moon in nearly 50 years - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Launch of the Luna-25 craft to the moon on Friday will be conducted without assistance the European Space Agency.
articles.content:
Russia is scheduled to launch its first mission to the moon in nearly 50 years, pitting it in a space race with India which is also aiming to land a lunar craft this month.

articles.title: JWST Turns its Gaze on the Farthest Known Star: Earendel - Universe Today
articles.description: Astronomers used JWST to study the farthest known star, Earendel, to get more information about it and its host galaxy.
articles.content: In March 2022, astronomers announced the discovery of the farthest known star via an image taken by the Hubble Space Telescope. They named it Earendel, after the old English name for “morning star”. … [+4299 chars]

articles.title: Bizarre 'demon' particle found inside superconductor could help unlock a 'holy grail' of physics - Livescience.com
articles.description: The transparent, chargeless quasiparticle could shed more light on the underlying mechanics of superconductivity
articles.content:
An elusive "demon" particle has been observed inside a superconductor nearly 70 years after it was first predicted. Its discovery could help resolve the mystery of how superconductors work.
